text: un logon ko jo bachate hain maha paapon tatha nirlajja[1] se, kuchh chook ke siva. vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar udaar, kshamaasheel hai. vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai tumhen, jabaki usane paida kiya tumhen dharatee[2] se tatha jab tum bhrun the apanee maataon ke garbh mein. atah, apane mein pavitr na bano. vahee bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai use, jisane sadaachaar kiya hai
